mapper.select: /* 멘토별 후기 조회 */ SELECT mp.mentoring_postscript_code, mn.mentoring_notice_title, mnd.day_mentoring_YMD, mnd.day_mentoring_time, mp.mentee_id, mp.mentoring_postscript_content, mp.mentoring_postscript_score, mp.mentoring_postscript_date FROM mentoring_postscript mp INNER JOIN mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc ON mp.`mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation` = msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code INNER JOIN mentoring_apply ma ON msmc.mentoring_apply_code = ma.mentoring_apply_code INNER JOIN mentoring_notice mn ON ma.mentoring_notice_code = mn.mentoring_notice_code INNER JOIN mentoring_notice_detail mnd ON ma.mentoring_notice_detail_code = mnd.mentoring_notice_detail_code WHERE mn.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY mp.mentoring_postscript_date DESC;
mapper.insert:
/* 후기 등록 */
INSERT INTO mentoring_postscript (mentoring_postscript_code, mentee_id, `mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation`, mentoring_postscript_content, mentoring_postscript_score, mentoring_postscript_date, mentoring_postscript_update_date) VALUES (#{reviewCode}, #{menteeId}, #{settlementCalCode}, #{reviewContent}, ${reviewScore}, NOW(), NULL);
mapper.select: /* 후기 수정을 위한 특정 후기 조회 */ SELECT mp.mentoring_postscript_code, mn.mentoring_notice_title, mp.mentoring_postscript_score, mp.mentoring_postscript_content FROM mentoring_postscript mp INNER JOIN mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc ON mp.`mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation` = msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code INNER JOIN mentoring_apply ma ON msmc.mentoring_apply_code = ma.mentoring_apply_code INNER JOIN mentoring_notice mn ON ma.mentoring_notice_code = mn.mentoring_notice_code WHERE mentee_id = #{memberId} AND mentoring_postscript_code = #{reviewCode};

/* 작성한 후기 목록 조회 */ SELECT mp.mentoring_postscript_code, mn.mentoring_notice_title, mnd.day_mentoring_YMD, mnd.day_mentoring_time, mn.member_id, mp.mentoring_postscript_content, mp.mentoring_postscript_score FROM mentoring_postscript mp INNER JOIN mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc ON mp.`mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation` = msmc.mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation_code INNER JOIN mentoring_apply ma ON msmc.mentoring_apply_code = ma.mentoring_apply_code INNER JOIN mentoring_notice mn ON ma.mentoring_notice_code = mn.mentoring_notice_code INNER JOIN mentoring_notice_detail mnd ON ma.mentoring_notice_detail_code = mnd.mentoring_notice_detail_code WHERE mp.mentee_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY mp.mentoring_postscript_date DESC;
/* 등록한 후기 있는지 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(mentoring_postscript_code) FROM mentoring_postscript WHERE `mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation` = #{payCode};
